name: Acrux
description:
Acrux

is a space shooting game with pixel graphics, fire music and based upon the retro game "Space Invaders".

"Ever since your home planet was taken over by a vicious army, chaos reigns. Now it’s up to you, the last Guardian, to save your planet."

Fight against enemy spaceships to get closer to the boss.

Collect powerups to either protect or strengthen yourself.

Defeat the end boss and free your planet from its tyranny.

Controlls

Move:  W, A, S, D or Left Stick (Gamepad)

Shoot:  Space, Left Click or South Button

Pause:  ESC

How to download

1. Download ZIP

2. Unpack

3. Start .exe

4. Enjoy the game!
